SQL.LOAD: SELECT product_code_id, price_range_from, price_range_to, method_of_repair_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, prod_repair_price_id FROM elp_prod_repair_price WHERE prod_repair_price_id = :prod_repair_price_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select a.prod_repair_price_id, a.price_range_from, a.price_range_to, a.method_of_repair_id, b.translation method_of_repair_desc, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.modified_by, a.modified_date, a.product_code_id FROM elp_prod_repair_price a , (SELECT LI.list_item_id , D.translation FROM ELITA.ELP_LIST L, ELITA.ELP_LIST_ITEM LI, ELITA.ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION D WHERE L.list_id = LI.list_id and L.code = 'METHR' and LI.dict_item_id = D.dict_item_id and D.language_id = :language_id) b WHERE a.product_code_id = :product_code_id and a.method_of_repair_id = b.list_item_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_prod_repair_price SET product_code_id = :product_code_id, price_range_from = :price_range_from, price_range_to = :price_range_to, method_of_repair_id = :method_of_repair_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE prod_repair_price_id = :prod_repair_price_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_prod_repair_price ( product_code_id, price_range_from, price_range_to, method_of_repair_id, created_by, prod_repair_price_id ) VALUES ( :product_code_id, :price_range_from, :price_range_to, :method_of_repair_id, :created_by, :prod_repair_price_id )
